xboxlive_achievements_set_progress: This function can be used to update the progress of an achievement. You supply the user ID as returned, for example, by the function xboxlive_get_user(), and then the achievement string (this is the achievement id as assigned in the XDP/Windows Dev Center when it was created). Finally you set the progress value to to a value from 0 to 100. Note that the achievement system will refuse updates that are lower than the current progress value.
The user ID of the user to set the achievement for
The progress value to set (from 0 to 100)
